attributes.action: SAFETY NET & INSURANCE for families of MEDICS & KEYWORKERS during COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: The medics and key workers are all on the frontline fighting the war with COVID-19 with little care about their families. The families of key workers are staying strong but constantly live with the fear and anxiety for their main breadwinner of the house. All the key workers go to their respective homes and put their families at risk. The families live in uncertainty and each day are at higher risk of being affected by this pandemic. Consideration for families of these superheroes is necessary.
attributes.background: The government should provide with some form of a financial safety net and insurance for the families of the NHS workers and key workers who are all at the frontline of this war with COVID-19.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these similar petitions:

Ensure employees are paid their full wage if they can't work due to coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652

Pay Key Workers 2 weeks full pay if they have to isolate: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309104

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319256

Provide financial security and compensation to the families of keyworker victims:
